Winnie Ntshaba (amụrụ 1 Septemba 1975)  Ntshaba's bu onye ome ihe nkiri South Africa akacha mara amara maka oru ya na Generations na SABC 1
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 2000 tupu ọ nwee ọganihu ya na Yesterday
A maara ya nke ọma maka ịgosiputa agwa ka Khethiwe Buthelezi na SABC 1 soap opera Generations
Ọ gụrụ gbasara omume ihe nkiri na Mahadum Natal (Durban).
Amụrụ Ntshaba n'abali mbụ nke ọnwa Septemba , afọ 1975 na Kwa-Zulu Natal
O nwere otu nwanna nwaanyị tọrọ ya, bụ́ onye kpaliri ya ịga n'ihu n'agụmakwụkwọ ya
Ọ gara Mahadum Natal (Durban), ebe ọ nwetara nzere BA Drama Honors
N'afọ 2000 ,ọ kwagara Johannesburg wee sonye na ihe ngosi ihe nkiri mmụta na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta akpụkpọ ụkwụ bụ AREPP Shoe String Productions
Mgbe ahụ ọ gbara gosiputara na ihe nkiri telivishọn 2004 Jozi Streets
E mere Ntshaba dị ka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri 2004 Yesterday na Leleti Khumalo
Nke a bụ nnukwu ihe nkiri nkiri ya, ọ nwetara nyocha dị mma maka ọrụ ya
N'otu afọ ahụ, e deputara Ntshaba n'ọrụ mbụ ya na ihe nkiri 2004 Shreds and Dreams nke Claire Stopford duziri
ma mesịa pụta na mmepụta atọ: Russian Services Lethal Force (ọrụ nkwado)
N'afọ 2013, Ntshaba bidoro emume nturu ugo Soap nke a kpọrọ Royalty Soapie Awards
E mere Ememme mbụ  na Durban International Convention Center n'abalị abụọ n'ọnwa Novemba, afọ 2013

Na 2005, Ntshaba bgara nnwale emume ihe nkiri maka ọrụ nke Khiwe Buthelezi na SABC 1 soap opera Generations (South African TV series), tinyere, ọ bụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke mmemme kemgbe ahụ,  ruo 2015 mgbe mmadụ iri na isii niile na-eme ihe nkiri nke ka Achụpụrụ n'ihe ngosi a maka igba abụba ọrụ   n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị n'ịchọ ụgwọ ọnwa ka mma karịa otu ha na eribu, ka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri gara n'ọrụ na-achọ ka a gbatịkwuo nkwekọrịta ha na ụgwọ  ha site na akụkọ nke egosigharịrị
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị soap, na 2017 Ntsaba mere ka ọ pụta ìhè na  Mzansi Magic "The Road", na MTV's Shuga
N'afọ 2018, mgbe afọ atọ kwụsịrị na ihu ngosi Ntshaba laghachiri na TV,   dị ka onye ndu na Mzansi Magic hit drama The herd, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Mam'Ngadi
O nwere ọrụ na Isithembiso dị ka nne Mam'Lihle Palesa
Na 2021, e deputara ya dị ka Faith Zwide na soapy House eTV nke Zwide
Ọ n'egosipụta dị ka nwunye na-enweghị isi nye Funani Zwide [nke Vusi Kunene na-eme], onye ọchụnta ego na-emepụta ihe.
N'afọ 2005, Ntshaba na onyeisi nke SABC Cameraman Thabo Modise malitere ịkpakọ
Ntshaba lụrụ Modise na 2006,  Na 9 Julaị 2009, ha nabatara ọmụmụ nwa ya nwoke, Phenyo Modise
N'afọ 2013 ka afọ asaa gachara, Ntshaba gbara akwụkwọ maka ịgba alụkwaghịm, n'otu afọ ahụ, ịgba alụkwaghịm ahụ chikọtara
